doc:
Bert Convy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bert_Convy 0 Bernard (Bert) Whalen Convy (July 23, 1933 – July 15, 1991) was an American actor, singer, game show host and panelist known for hosting Tattletales, Super Password and Win, Lose or Draw. Bernard ( Bert ) Whalen_Convy ( July_23_,_1933 – July_15_,_1991 ) was an_American_actor , singer , game_show_host_and_panelist known for hosting_Tattletales , Super_Password_and_Win , Lose_or_Draw .
